sourcesContent:
Shipping Prices

{{shipping.type}} {{shipping.price | currency}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shipping', templateUrl: './shipping.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shipping.component.css'] }) export class ShippingComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} shippingCosts!: Observable<{ type: string; price: number }[]>; ngOnInit(): void { this.shippingCosts = this.cartService.getShippingPrices(); } }
